snippet: West Brom defender Gareth McAuley is keen to extend his stint at the Premier League club for at least another season but is in no rush to start negotiations about a fresh deal....
lead_paragraph: West Brom defender Gareth McAuley is keen to extend his stint at the Premier League club for at least another season but is in no rush to start negotiations about a fresh deal.

headline.main: West Brom's McAuley Relaxed Over Future
headline.print_headline: West Brom's McAuley Relaxed Over Future
